title: The Substrate Seminar
subtitle: a collaborative learning group.
first_description: Substrate Seminar is an open collaborative learning call where we learn about Substrate together.
main_description: Substrate Seminar is an open Collaborative Learning call where we learn about Substrate together. We meet every Tuesday at 14:00UTC. Ask for help, show off your project, learn Substrate, and make friends!

topics.content: Cecile Tonglet will join us to talk about the new Substrate CLI and how to use and extend it. We may also briefly explore the Substrate Service and Cumulus.
Joshy Orndorff and Nicole Zhu will discuss a UTXO pallet and creating a bitcoin-like chain on Substrate.
Seminar is Cancelled. Let's all attend Sub0 Online instead!

faqs.question: How do I join the call?
faqs.answer: We meet using zoom video conferencing. Specifically we meet in https://zoom.us/j/916767726. This link will only work when the call is live, so you may prefer to add this Google calendar invitation to you own calendar.

videos.title: Stable Coin and Storage Adapters
videos.description: Alexander Popiak joins us to discuss his uncollateralized stablecoin implementation and the 'Transient Storage Adapters' pattern
